data.name: txtChiTietCongNoPhaiTra2.EditValue
data.value:
declare @TuNgay as datetime declare @DenNgay as datetime declare @IdKH as int
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
declare @NgayChot as datetime set @NgayChot = '01/08/2017' set @IdKH = 7 * 1 * 1 * 1
declare @tblKetQua as table( SoPhieu nvarchar(30), TenVatTu nvarchar(1500), Ngay datetime, SoTT int, MaVatTu nvarchar(500), DonViTinh nvarchar(30), SoLuong float, DonGia float, TienHang float, TienThue float, TongTienTamUng float, ConLaiTamUng float, PhatSinhNo float, PhatSinhCo float, LuyKe float, HanThu datetime, LoaiCT nvarchar(50), SapXep int, Ngay2 datetime, SoPhieu2 nvarchar(30), SoDH nvarchar(30) ) --select * from MUCDICHTHUCHI where id in(100,109,210,230) -- thông tin đầu kỳ -----------------
declare @LuyKeDauKy as float declare @ConPhaiThuDauKy as float declare @UngTruocDauKy as float
set @ConPhaiThuDauKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 0),0)
set @UngTruocDauKy = ( select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from THU where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from THUNH where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select TamUng from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 0),0)
set @LuyKeDauKy = @ConPhaiThuDauKy - @UngTruocDauKy
insert into @tblKetQua(TenVatTu,TongTienTamUng,PhatSinhCo,LuyKe) SELECT N'Đầu kỳ: ',(select isnull(TamUng,0) from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 0),(select isnull(ConThieu,0) from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 0), @LuyKeDauKy
-- Lấy thông tin chi tạm ứng -- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, TongTienTamUng, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) select 'TM ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien, N'Tạm ứng TM',1, PhieuTC0 from CHI WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, TongTienTamUng, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) select 'NH ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, Ngaythang, SoTien, N'Tạm ứng NH',2,PhieuTC0 from UNC WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- Lấy thông tin tiền nhập kho ------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, Ngay, TenVatTu,DonViTinh,MaVatTu,SoLuong,DonGia,TienHang,SoTT,TienThue,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) SELECT 'NK ' + PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu, PHIEUNHAPKHO.Ngaythang, TENVATTU.ten AS TenVatTu, TENDONVITINH.TEN AS DonViTinh, VATTU.Model, NHAPKHO.Soluong, NHAPKHO.Dongia, (NHAPKHO.Soluong * NHAPKHO.Dongia)ThanhTien, NHAPKHO.AZ AS Stt, (case when NHAPKHO.Nhapthue = 1 then (SoLuong * DonGia) * (MucThue / 100.0) else 0 end)TienThue, N'Nhập kho',6, SophieuDH FROM NHAPKHO LEFT OUTER JOIN VATTU LEFT OUTER JOIN TENDONVITINH ON VATTU.IDTenvattu = TENDONVITINH.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TENVATTU ON VATTU.IDTenvattu = TENVATTU.ID ON NHAPKHO.IDvattu = VATTU.ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN PHIEUNHAPKHO ON NHAPKHO.Sophieu = PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu where PHIEUNHAPKHO.IdKhachHang = @IdKH AND Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,PHIEUNHAPKHO.NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay
-- Lấy tiền chi phân bổ ------------ insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhNo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH,TenVatTu) (select 'CPB ' + SoPhieu,NgayThang,PhanBoTamUng,N'Phân bổ',3,SoPhieuDH, (select GiaiThich from DM_HINH_THUC_TT where id = (select IDHinhThucTT2 from PHIEUDATHANG where Sophieu = SoPhieuDH)) from PHIEUNHAPKHO where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and PhanBoTamUng <> 0 and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
-- Hoàn tạm ứng -------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep, SoDH) (select 'HTM ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangCT, Sotien,N'Hoàn tạm ứng TM',9 ,(select SoPhieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from THU where MucDich = 109 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) (select 'HNH ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangCT, Sotien,N'Hoàn tạm ứng NH',10 ,(select SoPhieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from THUNH where MucDich = 109 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
-- Chi nhập kho ------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhNo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) select 'TM ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien, N'Thu nhập kho TM',7 ,(select SoPhieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from CHI WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhNo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) select 'NH ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, Ngaythang, SoTien, N'Thu nhập kho NH',8 ,(select SoPhieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from UNC WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- tạo phiếu nhập kho tổng bên cột phát sinh có ---------------------------------------------
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoDH) select SoPhieu,Ngay,SUM(TienHang+TienThue),N'Phiếu NK',4,SoDH from @tblKetQua where LoaiCT = N'Nhập kho' group by SoPhieu,Ngay,SODH
update @tblKetQua set Ngay2 = Ngay, SoPhieu2 = SoPhieu
update @tblKetQua set SoPhieu = SoTT, Ngay = null where LoaiCT = N'Nhập kho' -- trừ tạm ứng còn lại sau phiếu thu phân bổ ---------------------------------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(TenVatTu,LoaiCT,SapXep,Ngay2,SoPhieu2,SoTT,SoDH) select N'T.Ứ ĐH' + SoDH + N' còn lại' ,N'Tạm ứng còn lại',4,Ngay2,SoPhieu2,-1,SoDH from @tblKetQua where LoaiCT = N'Phân bổ'
select * from @tblKetQua order by Ngay2,SapXep,SoPhieu2,SoTT

data.name: txtChiTietCongNoPhaiTra.EditValue
data.value:
declare @TuNgay datetime declare @DenNgay datetime declare @idkh int set @idkh = 7* 1 * 1 * 1 set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016' declare @tbl table (SoPhieu nvarchar(50),ngay datetime,IDvattu int,ten nvarchar(500), mavt nvarchar(50),dvt nvarchar(50),soluong int,dongia float,Tygia float, mucthue int, nhapthue float, tienhang float, tienthue float, sotien float, idkh int, SapXep int, LoaiCT nvarchar(100),SoPhieu2 nvarchar(50))
insert into @tbl(ten,LoaiCT) SELECT N'Đầu kỳ: Ứng trước/ phải thu',''
--Chi mua hang insert into @tbl(SoPhieu,ngay,ten,mavt,dvt,sotien,idkh, SapXep ,LoaiCT,SoPhieu2) select tbl.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgayThang, Diengiai ,null Model ,null IDDonvitinh,SoTien,IDKh, 1,'CHIMH',SoPhieu2 from ( select 'CHI '+ CHI.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgaythangCT as NgayThang, Sotien, IdKh ,Diengiai,SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from CHI where Mucdich =210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and IDKh =20 union select 'UNC '+UNC.SoPhieu SoPhieu,Ngaythang,Sotien ,IDKh ,Diengiai,SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from UNC where Mucdich =210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and IDKh =@idkh ) tbl where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and IDKh =@idkh ORDER BY NgayThang,tbl.SoPhieu
--Nhap kho tong insert into @tbl(SoPhieu ,idkh ,ngay , Sotien,SapXep,LoaiCT,SoPhieu2 ) select 'NK '+PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu SoPhieu,IDKhachhang,NgayThang, sum((NHAPKHO.SoLuong * NHAPKHO.DonGia * Tygia) +(NHAPKHO.SoLuong * NHAPKHO.DonGia * Tygia* NHAPKHO.Mucthue /100 * NhapThue)) ,2 ,'NhapKhoTong' ,PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from PHIEUNHAPKHO left outer join NHAPKHO on PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu =NHAPKHO .SOPhieu left outer join VATTU on IDvattu = VATTU.ID left outer join TENVATTU on IDTenvattu =TENVATTU .ID where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and IDKhachhang =@idkh group by PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu,IDKhachhang,NgayThang
--Nhap kho chi tiet insert into @tbl select 0 SoPhieu,NgayThang, IDVattu, ten,Model, IDDonvitinh ,NHAPKHO.SoLuong,NHAPKHO.DonGia,Tygia,NHAPKHO.Mucthue,NhapThue ,(NHAPKHO.SoLuong * NHAPKHO.DonGia * Tygia) TienHang,(NHAPKHO.SoLuong * NHAPKHO.DonGia * Tygia* NHAPKHO.Mucthue /100 * NhapThue)TienThue --,Tientruocthue TienHang,TienThue ,null as sotien , IDKhachhang ,3 ,'NhapKhoChiTiet' ,PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from PHIEUNHAPKHO left outer join NHAPKHO on PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu =NHAPKHO .SOPhieu left outer join VATTU on IDvattu = VATTU.ID left outer join TENVATTU on IDTenvattu =TENVATTU .ID where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and IDKhachhang =@idkh
--Chi phan bo insert into @tbl(SoPhieu,ngay,ten,mavt,dvt,sotien,idkh,SapXep,LoaiCT,SoPhieu2 ) select 'TPB '+PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgayThang,null ,null, null,sum(PhanBoTamUng ) SoTien,IDKhachhang , 4 ,'ThuPhanBo' ,PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from PHIEUNHAPKHO left outer join NHAPKHO on PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu =NHAPKHO .SOPhieu left outer join VATTU on IDvattu = VATTU.ID left outer join TENVATTU on IDTenvattu =TENVATTU .ID where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and IDKhachhang =@idkh group by PHIEUNHAPKHO.SOPhieu,NgayThang,IDKhachhang
--Tinh so tam ung con lai insert into @tbl(SoPhieu,ngay,ten,mavt,dvt,sotien,idkh, SapXep ,LoaiCT,SoPhieu2) select tbl.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgayThang, Diengiai ,null Model ,null IDDonvitinh,SoTien,IDKh, 5,'TinhSoTamUngConLai',SoPhieu2 from ( select 'CHI '+ CHI.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgaythangCT as NgayThang, Sotien, IdKh ,Diengiai,SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from CHI where Mucdich =210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and IDKh =20 union select 'UNC '+UNC.SoPhieu SoPhieu,Ngaythang,Sotien ,IDKh ,Diengiai,SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from UNC where Mucdich =210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and IDKh =@idkh ) tbl where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and IDKh =@idkh ORDER BY NgayThang,tbl.SoPhieu
--Thu hoan tam ung insert into @tbl(SoPhieu,ngay,ten,mavt,dvt,sotien,idkh,SapXep,LoaiCT,SoPhieu2 ) select 'THU '+ tbl.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgayThang, Diengiai ,null Model ,null IDDonvitinh,SoTien,IDKh,6,'ThuHoanTamUng',tbl.SoPhieu as SoPhieu2 from ( select SoPhieu,NgaythangCT as NgayThang, Sotien, IdKh ,Diengiai from THU where Mucdich =109 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and IDkh =@idkh union select SoPhieu,NgaythangCT as NgayThang,Sotien ,IDKh ,Diengiai from THUNH where Mucdich =109 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and IDkh =@idkh ) tbl inner join CHAOGIA on CHAOGIA.SoPhieu =tbl .Sophieu where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay ORDER BY NgayThang,tbl.SoPhieu
---chi nhap kho phan con lai insert into @tbl(SoPhieu,ngay,ten,mavt,dvt,sotien,idkh, SapXep,LoaiCT,SoPhieu2 ) select tbl.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgayThang, Diengiai ,null Model ,null IDDonvitinh,SoTien,IDKh, 7, 'ChiPhanConLai',SoPhieu2
from ( select 'CHI '+ CHI.SoPhieu SoPhieu,NgaythangCT as NgayThang, Sotien, IdKh ,Diengiai, Sophieu as SoPhieu2 from CHI where Mucdich =210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and IDKh =20 union select 'UNC '+UNC.SoPhieu SoPhieu,Ngaythang,Sotien ,IDKh ,Diengiai, Sophieu as SoPhieu2 from UNC where Mucdich =210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and IDKh =@idkh ) tbl where NgayThang between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and IDKh =@idkh ORDER BY NgayThang,tbl.SoPhieu
select SoPhieu, tb.ten TenVatTu,Ngay, mavt MaVatTU, TENDONVITINH.TEN DonViTinh,SoLuong,DonGia, TienHang,TienThue, LoaiCT,null as LuyKe, null as SoTT , case when (SoPhieu like '%CHI%' or SoPhieu like '%UNC%') and LoaiCT <>'TinhSoTamUngConLai' then sotien else null end TongTienTamUng , case when SoPhieu like '%CHI%' or SoPhieu like '%UNC%' then sotien else null end PhatSinhNo , case when SoPhieu like '%NK%' then sotien else null end PhatSinhCo , case when SoPhieu like '%TPB%' then sotien else null end TongTienTamUng , case when LoaiCT ='TinhSoTamUngConLai' then sotien-(select SoTien from @tbl where SoPhieu='TPB '+tb.SoPhieu2 ) else null end ConLaiTamUng from @tbl tb left join TENDONVITINH on dvt=TENDONVITINH .id order by idkh asc, ngay asc,SapXep asc

data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiTra.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016' declare @NgayChot as datetime set @NgayChot = '01/08/2017' SELECT ID,ttcMa ,(TamUngDauKy -PhanBoDauKy -DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy+UngDauKy)TamUngDauKy ,(XuatKhoDauKy-PhanBoDauKy-DaThuXuatKhoDauKy+ConThieuDauKy) ConPhaiThuDauKy ,(TamUngTrongKy -PhanBoTrongKy )TamUngTrongKyConLai ,XuatKhoTrongKy PhaiThuTrongKy ,(PhanBoTrongKy +DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy)DaThuTrongKy ,DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy HoanTamUngTrongKy ,(TamUngDauKy -PhanBoDauKy -DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy+UngDauKy)+(TamUngTrongKy -PhanBoTrongKy )-DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy UngTruocCuoiKy ,(XuatKhoDauKy-PhanBoDauKy-DaThuXuatKhoDauKy+ConThieuDauKy)+XuatKhoTrongKy-(PhanBoTrongKy +DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy) ConPhaiThuCuoiKy FROM
(
SELECT ID, ttcMa,
/***** DAU KY *****/
-- tạm chi đầu kỳ --
--tong nha cung cap tam ung dau ky (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = KHACHHANG.ID and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from THU where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from THUNH where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot)
TamUngDauKy, -- đã phân bổ nhập kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang=KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot
)PhanBoDauKy, -- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from THUNH where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) as DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy,
-- phải Chi Nhâp kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) XuatKhoDauKy, -- đã CHI nhập kho (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) as DaThuXuatKhoDauKy, --Còn thiếu đầu kỳ isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = KHACHHANG.id and TrangThai = 0),0) ConThieuDauKy, --Tạm ứng đầu kỳ isnull((select TamUng from congnohethongdauky where idKH = KHACHHANG.id and TrangThai = 0),0) UngDauKy,
/***** TRONG KY *****/
-- tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as TamUngTrongKy, -- đã phân bổ nhập kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang=KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay
)PhanBoTrongKy,
-- phải CHI nhập kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay )XuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã CHI nhập kho trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from THUNH where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy
FROM KHACHHANG
)TBL
WHERE
TamUngDauKy <> 0 or XuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or PhanBoDauKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy <> 0 or TamUngTrongKy <> 0 or XuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy <> 0 or PhanBoTrongKy <> 0
ORDER BY ttcMa

data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiThu.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
DECLARE @tblKQ as table( Id int, ttcMa nvarchar(50), TamUngDauKy float, ConPhaiThuDauKy float, TamUngTrongKyConLai float, PhaiThuTrongKy float, DaThuTrongKy float, HoanTamUngTrongKy float, UngTruocCuoiKy float, ConPhaiThuCuoiKy float )
insert into @tblKQ(Id,ttcMa) SELECT Id,ttcMa FROM KHACHHANG
update tbl
set -- KH tạm ứng trước =Tổng Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) (đến thời điểm A) – Thu phân bổ (đến thời điểm A) – Hoàn tạm ứng (đến thời điểm A). TamUngDauKy = ( select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay),
-- Số phải thu ( tống tất cả các giá trị xuất kho) - Thu phân bổ – thu ngân hàng (Thu cho XK)– thu tiền mặt (Thu cho XK) ConPhaiThuDauKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay),
-- Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) – Thu phân bổ (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) TamUngTrongKyConLai = ( select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- Tổng giá trị các xuất kho (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) PhaiThuTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- Thu phân bổ + Thu tiền mặt (Thu cho XK) + Thu ngân hàng (Thu cho XK) (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) DaThuTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- phiếu chi có mục đích hoàn tạm ứng (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) HoanTamUngTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
from @tblKQ tbl
-- Xoa du lieu thua delete from @tblKQ where TamUngDauKy + ConPhaiThuDauKy + TamUngTrongKyConLai + PhaiThuTrongKy + DaThuTrongKy + HoanTamUngTrongKy = 0
-- CUOI KY ----------------- -- KH tạm ứng trước = Tổng Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) (đến thời điểm B) – Thu phân bổ (đến thời điểm B) – Hoàn tạm ứng (đến thời điểm B). update @tblKQ SET UngTruocCuoiKy = TamUngTrongKyConLai + TamUngDauKy - HoanTamUngTrongKy, ConPhaiThuCuoiKy = ConPhaiThuDauKy + PhaiThuTrongKy - DaThuTrongKy
select * from @tblKQ
